name: UIFont.TextStyle
desc: Constants that describe the preferred styles for fonts.

items.name: static let largeTitle: UIFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font style for large titles.

items.name: static let title1: UIFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font for first-level hierarchical headings.

items.name: static let title2: UIFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font for second-level hierarchical headings.

items.name: static let title3: UIFont.TextStyle
items.desc: The font for third-level hierarchical headings.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a text style with the specified raw value.
